name: Souljourn - Chapter 1
description:
Made with RPG MAKER MV

This is the first chapter (of hopefully many) of Souljourn. A story of a King lost in an eerie world filled with monsters and other unholy beings. This first chapter begins with the king but you will eventually take control of Vanya Cross, a mercenary/rogue tasked with finding him and safely bringing him back.

This is the second game I've made.  I've taken what I learned from my first game and applied that knowledge to this game. The criticism was a big help.
